item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国证券监管机构可能提拔执法总监为副主席
item.description: 四位消息人士称，中国证券监管机构很可能将其执法部门负责人提升为副主席，此举凸显了中国政府加强对 37 万亿元人民币（5.1 万亿美元）股票市场监管的决心。【原文：China's securities regulator is likely to promote its head of law enforcement to the role of vice chairman, four sources said, a move that underscores Beijing's determination to tighten oversight of the 37 trillion yuan ($5.1 trillion) stock market.】

item.title: 广告集团 WPP 任命英国电信前老板菲利普-詹森为新主席
item.description: WPP 周二任命英国电信前总裁菲利普-詹森（Philip Jansen）为新主席，接替罗伯托-夸塔（Roberto Quarta）成为全球最大的广告公司主席。【原文：WPP named former BT chief Philip Jansen as its new chair on Tuesday, succeeding Roberto Quarta at the world's largest advertising company.】

item.title: 烈酒制造商帝亚吉欧未达财政年度利润预期
item.description: 本周二，帝亚吉欧公布年度利润下降 4.8%，略低于分析师预期，原因是拉丁美洲和加勒比地区的销售额急剧下降。【原文：Diageo reported 4.8% decline in annual profit on Tuesday, just short of analyst expectations, due to a steep decline in sales in Latin America and the Caribbean.】

item.title: 日本野村第一季度利润增长三倍，得益于财富管理收益
item.description: 周二，日本最大的经纪和投资银行野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings）公布第一季度利润大增 195%，原因是全球市场反弹和国内通胀回升促进了对其财富管理服务的需求。【原文：Nomura Holdings , Japan's largest brokerage and investment bank, reported a 195% jump in first-quarter profit on Tuesday as the rally in global markets and return of domestic inflation bolstered demand for its wealth management services.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，瑞士监管机构审查瑞银对瑞士信贷富裕客户的审查情况
item.description: 消息人士透露，瑞士金融监管机构一直在仔细审查瑞银是如何审核其希望从瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）转移的高风险富裕客户的，因为监管机构对该银行整合其衰落的竞争对手采取了一种亲力亲为的态度。【原文：Switzerland's financial supervisor has been scrutinising how UBS vets risky wealthy clients that it wants to transfer from Credit Suisse, sources said, as the regulator takes a hands-on approach to the bank's integration of its fallen rival.】

item.title: 瑞银称今年澳大利亚企业利润将加速下滑
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS）周二表示，澳大利亚公司今年的利润降幅可能会比去年更大，因为它们正努力追赶 COVID-19 大流行以来的 "异常高 "收益。【原文：Australian companies will likely post a steeper drop in profit this year than they did last year, as they struggle to match the 'abnormally high' earnings since the COVID-19 pandemic, UBS said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度阿达尼企业有望在未来几周内首次发行公债
item.description: 印度阿达尼企业公司（Adani Enterprises）是阿达尼集团（Adani Group）的旗舰公司，据两位知情人士周二透露，该公司计划在未来几周内首次公开发行债券，以筹集高达 60 亿卢比（约合 7170 万美元）的资金。【原文：India's Adani Enterprises , the flagship firm of Adani Group, plans to launch its first-ever public issue of bonds in the coming weeks to raise up to 6 billion rupees ($71.7 million), two sources aware of the development said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加息预期升温，投资者坚持押注日本银行
item.description: 与其他行业相比，日本银行吸引了更多的外国投资，因为投资者认为它们是潜在货币紧缩政策的最大受益者。【原文：Japanese banks have attracted larger foreign investment flows than other sectors, as investors see them as top beneficiaries of potential monetary tightening.】

item.title: 韩国 7 月出口将实现 26 个月来最强劲增长：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周二的一项民意调查显示，由于美国需求强劲和中国经济复苏，电脑芯片销售继续引领增长，韩国 7 月份的出口预计将创下 26 个月以来的最快增速。【原文：South Korea's exports are expected to have risen in July at the fastest pace in 26 months, as computer chip sales continued to lead growth with robust demand in the United States and a recovery in China, a Reuters poll showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 透析公司FMC下调美国治疗量展望，股价下跌
item.description: 全球最大的透析专业公司费森尤斯医疗用品公司周二下调了其主要美国市场的透析量前景，原因是第二季度美国市场的治疗收入下降，受COVID-19和流感导致的患者死亡率上升的影响。【原文：World's largest dialysis specialist Fresenius Medical Care cut the outlook for volumes in its key U.S. market on Tuesday after revenue from treatments there fell in the second quarter, weighed down by elevated mortality due to COVID-19 and flu among its patients.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美联储决议前石油下滑，股市缓和
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 受日本和中国拖累，丰田 6 月全球产量下滑
item.description: 6 月份，丰田汽车的全球产量连续第五个月下滑，其国内市场的认证丑闻和中国市场激烈的价格战对该公司造成了沉重打击。【原文：Toyota's global production tumbled in June, down for a fifth straight month with the automaker hit hard by a certification scandal in its home market and a fierce price war in China.】

item.title: StanChart 宣布回购 15 亿美元股票，上半年利润增长 5
item.description: 渣打银行（StanChart）周二报告称，今年前六个月的税前利润增长了 5%，略高于分析师的预期，并宣布了迄今为止规模最大的一次股票回购。【原文：Standard Chartered (StanChart) on Tuesday reported its pretax profit rose 5% in the first six months of the year, just ahead of analysts' estimates and announced its largest share buyback to date.】

item.title: 到目前为止，全球盈利情况好得令人失望
item.description: 由于利率上升和中国经济疲软损害了全球消费情绪，全球企业纷纷下调全年销售额和利润指导，使最新季度的盈利增长黯然失色。【原文：Companies worldwide are lowering full-year sales and profit guidance as higher interest rates and weakness in China's economy hurt global consumer sentiment, taking the shine off earnings growth in the latest quarter.】

item.title: 美联储为减息敞开大门，日本央行将讨论加息时机
item.description: 日本央行将于周三详细说明缩减巨额债券购买的计划，并就下一次加息的时间进行辩论，这表明日本央行决心稳步解除十年来的大规模货币刺激政策。【原文：The Bank of Japan will detail plans to taper its huge bond buying and debate the timing of a next interest rate hike on Wednesday, signalling its resolve to steadily unwind a decade of massive monetary stimulus.】

item.title: 美联储和日本央行会议前，石油下滑，亚洲股市下跌
item.description: 由于需求前景疲软拖累大宗商品，周二石油市场接近七周低点，而债券、货币和股票市场在美国和日本央行会议以及一系列主要企业财报公布前交投谨慎。【原文：Oil traded near seven-week lows on Tuesday as a softening demand outlook weighed on commodities, while bond, currency and stock markets traded cautiously ahead of central bank meetings in the U.S. and Japan and a slew of major corporate earnings reports.】

item.title: 在日本央行和美联储会议之前，美元和日元维持区间震荡
item.description: 周二，在日本央行和美联储周中货币政策会议拉开帷幕之际，交易员们正在等待一系列重要的央行决定，美元和日元汇率保持在接近区间内波动。【原文：The dollar and yen kept within close ranges on Tuesday as traders awaited a barrage of key central bank decisions, kicking off with midweek monetary policy meetings from the Bank of Japan and Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 油价因中国需求担忧和中东忧虑减弱而下滑
item.description: 周二亚市早盘，油价下滑，延续了上一交易日的跌势，原因是对中国需求的担忧，以及市场对中东冲突升级风险的回避。【原文：Oil prices slipped in early Asian trading on Tuesday, extending losses from the previous session, over concerns about Chinese demand and as the market shrugged off the risk of conflict escalating in the Middle East.】

item.title: 上诉法院阻止美国航空收费披露规定
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周一阻止了美国交通部要求预先披露航空公司费用的新规定，以待对该规定进行全面审查。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Monday blocked the U.S. Transportation Department's new rule requiring upfront disclosure of airline fees pending a full review of the regulation.】

item.title: 必和必拓与伦丁矿业公司将以 32.5 亿美元收购 Filo 公司
item.description: 全球矿业公司必和必拓集团（BHP Group）和加拿大上市公司隆丁矿业公司（Lundin Mining）周一表示，将以 45 亿加元（32.5 亿美元）的价格收购勘探公司 Filo Corp，以推进 Filo del Sol 和 Josemaria 项目。【原文：Global miner BHP Group and Canada-listed Lundin Mining will takeover explorer Filo Corp for C$4.5 billion ($3.25 billion), the companies said on Monday, as they move to progress the Filo del Sol and Josemaria projects.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，广告集团 WPP 任命英国电信前老板菲利普-詹森（Philip Jansen）为新主席
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引知情人士的话报道称，英国 WPP 公司将选择英国电信集团前首席执行官菲利普-詹森（Philip Jansen）担任新主席。【原文：Britain's WPP is set to pick former BT Group chief Philip Jansen as its new chair, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本 6 月失业率降至 2.5%，职位供应量下滑
item.description: 日本政府周二公布的数据显示，日本 6 月份的失业率较上月下降至 2.5%。【原文：Japan's jobless rate in June fell to 2.5% from the previous month, government data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: Meta 允许用户创建自定义人工智能角色
item.description: Meta Platforms 周一表示，它将推出一款名为 AI Studio 的新工具，允许用户创建、共享和设计个性化的人工智能聊天机器人。【原文：Meta Platforms on Monday said it will roll out a new tool called AI Studio that will allow users to create, share and design personalized AI chatbots.】

item.title: 新加坡淡马锡计划未来五年在美投资 300 亿美元
item.description: 新加坡国有投资者淡马锡计划未来五年在美国投资 300 亿美元，投资领域包括医疗保健和金融服务。【原文：Singapore state investor Temasek plans to invest up to $30 billion over the next five years in the US in sectors such as healthcare and financial services.】

item.title: 苹果称未使用英伟达 GPU 训练人工智能模型
item.description: 据苹果公司周一发表的一份研究报告称，苹果公司依靠 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司设计的芯片，而不是业界领先的英伟达公司（Nvidia）来构建新的人工智能软件基础设施，为其即将推出的人工智能工具和功能套件提供动力。【原文：Apple relied on chips designed by Alphabet's Google rather than industry leader Nvidia to build its new artificial-intelligence software infrastructure that will power its forthcoming suite of AI tools and features, according to an Apple research paper it published on Monday.】

item.title: 早间竞价等待美联储和日本央行的博弈
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 新西兰航空公司放弃 2030 年碳强度降低目标
item.description: 新西兰航空公司周二表示，由于在机队更新和燃料供应方面面临挑战，将放弃 2030 年碳强度减排目标。【原文：Air New Zealand said on Tuesday would drop its 2030 carbon intensity reduction target due to challenges faced in fleet renewal and fuel availability.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，达美航空公司将就网络故障寻求赔偿
item.description: 据 CNBC 周一报道，达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）已聘请了一家律师事务所，并将就本月早些时候导致全球航班中断的全球网络中断事件向微软和 CrowdStrike 寻求赔偿。【原文：Delta Air Lines has hired a law firm and will seek compensation from Microsoft and CrowdStrike over the global cyber outage earlier this month that disrupted flights around the world, CNBC reported on Monday.】

item.title: 切萨皮克第二季度出现亏损，原因是价格持续走低
item.description: 天然气生产商切萨皮克能源公司（Chesapeake Energy）周一报告称，由于天然气价格持续疲软，该公司第二季度出现亏损，而去年同期则实现了盈利。【原文：Natural gas producer Chesapeake Energy on Monday reported a second-quarter loss, compared to a year-ago profit, dented by persistently weak prices for the commodity.】

item.title: Charter 将支付 1500 万美元解决美国对网络中断规则的调查
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会（Federal Communications Commission）周一表示，Charter Communications 将支付 1500 万美元的民事罚款，以解决对遵守网络和 911 故障通知规定的调查。【原文：Charter Communications will pay a $15 million civil penalty to resolve an investigation into compliance with network and 911 outage notification rules, the Federal Communications Commission said on Monday.】
